vote.text: Amendment SA 4070 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 78 - 11. Record Vote Number: 29.

action.text: Amendment SA 4070 proposed by Senator Murkowski for Senator DeMint to Amendment SA 3899. (consideration: CR S1030-1032; text: CR S1030) Of a perfecting nature.
